author: Travisknngv Ampedpages Com
title: The Definitive Guide to oraciones a la virgen del carmen
text:
Muchas personas en el mundo están luchando contra la muerte pues su salud empeora cada vez más, esta oración es para encomendar a los moribundos a la Virgen del Carmen para que les brinde la salud que necesitan.
Perdona todas las faltas que he cometido en contra tuya y de tu hijo, Jesús. Limpia mi espíritu de cualquier impureza que me imposibilite sentir el verdadero amor del Señor.
De repente, una densa niebla cubrió la ciudad y los barcos de los piratas no pudieron ver nada. Los barcos chocaron entre sí y muchos de ellos se hundieron. Los piratas supervivientes huyeron del lugar y nunca más volvieron a atacar Coquimbo.
Nuestra misión es informar y entretener a toda la comunidad latina que vive y trabajar en los Estados Unidos.
En momentos de angustia, duda o desesperanza, podemos acudir a ella con fe y esperanza, sabiendo que nuestra Madre celestial nos escucha y nos acompaña en nuestro camino hacia la salvación.
Abrir nuestro corazón es más sencillo cuando sabemos que lo hacemos a un ser que nos ama más que a nada en el mundo, la Virgen del Carmen, es Nuestra Madre, vela siempre por nosotros y desde pequeños sabemos que nos entrega su amor incondicional, si estamos en algún problema o necesitamos de su ayuda, no tengas miedo en acudir a ella, porque hará todo lo que esté en su mano para ayudarte.
Un domingo sixteen de junio de 1251, el Superior General de los Padres Carmelitas del convento de Cambridge se encontraba orando por su orden, cuando de pronto la Virgen María se le reveló con una indumentaria como la de su orden y con el Niño Jesús en su regazo sosteniendo un escapulario que le es entregado junto a estas palabras:
Hoy ruego ante tu agraciada túnica que siempre me ilumines por los caminos oscuros de esta vida, en los cuales yo pueda extraviarme sin tu mano amiga querida Virgen del Carmen.
Apartad de nuestras naciones los
paginas web terremotos, epidemias y calamidades, alejad de nuestros mares las tormentas y dad la abundancia a nuestros campos y montañas. Sé el remedio de los enfermos, la fortaleza de las almas atribuladas, la protección especial de los moribundos y la redentora de las almas del Purgatorio.
La oración a la Virgen del Carmen les da fuerzas para seguir adelante, les ayuda a encontrar soluciones y les brinda consuelo en momentos de tristeza.

Utilizamos tecnologías como las cookies para almacenar y/o acceder a la información del dispositivo. Lo hacemos para mejorar la experiencia de navegación y para mostrar anuncios personalizados.
two. Madre compasiva: La Virgen del Carmen es conocida como la Madre de todos los cristianos. Su compasión y amor maternal nos reconfortan en momentos de angustia y nos ayudan a encontrar consuelo en su regazo.

author: SNS
title: 56mm rain in city, Met predicts further rain
text:
From the blistering heat of 39.2 degrees Celsius to hail storms, the city witnessed extreme weather conditions within a week. Braving the hot and humid weather for about a month, Kolkata was drenched on Thursday with 56mm of rain from 8.30am till 5.30pm along with hail storms in southern pockets of the city.
The weatherman said that 13-km tall clouds hang over the city, which will cause rains till tomorrow.
Between 1pm and 3pm, the city was lashed by bolstered rain. The real surprise was for the residents of places like Jadavpur and Kudghat, where ice in the form of hail was seen with the rain. According to the data received from the Kolkata Municipal Corporation, the highest rainfall was recorded at Ballygunge. This part of the city received 75mm of rainfall followed by Mominpore that was drenched with 68mm of precipitation.
Dhapa in the Eastern fringes of the city also received 67mm of rainfall from 1pm to 3pm. While the downpour continued in several pockets of Kolkata for two hours from, many places, including Palmer Bazar, Dhapa, Maniktala, Topsia and Thanthania received higher rainfall between 1pm to 2pm. The city sky remained overcast for greater parts of the day with drizzles continuing even after 3pm in a few pockets.
According to the Regional Meteorological Centre, the cyclonic circulation over Bangladesh and its neighbourhood now lies over the eastern parts of the country while another trough line runs from east Assam to north Odisha, across Gangetic West Bengal. The dual weather system is responsible for favourable synoptic conditions and strong moisture incursion from Bay of Bengal and would bring thunderstorm, lightning, gusty wind and thunder squall activity in various districts of south Bengal. The weather office has issued an orange warning of thunder squall with speed reaching 50-60 kmph in nine districts of south Bengal for tomorrow. The city of Kolkata has also been given an orange alert of the thunder squall for tomorrow. As per the weather scientists, the rainfall and thunderstorm are likely to be more intense till tomorrow. From Friday, the rainfall is anticipated to get reduced in Kolkata.

author: AJ Spurr
title: College Football Playoff: Was Michigan scared to face Alabama?
text:
When the final College Football Playoff rankings were revealed, many were shocked to see which team was granted the fourth and final spot. Alabama, with one loss and an SEC championship, got the nod over undefeated ACC champion Florida State. Fans, players and coaches were caught off guard, but none more than the Seminoles… and Michigan.
The one-seeded Wolverines were all together watching the announcement, and the moment was captured on film. Once Alabama’s name was announced, there was a moment of silence where everyone looked around at each other before slowly clapping. There was no true sense of excitement from the room, as seen in the video below posted to social media by ESPN’s Adam Rittenberg.
Michigan reacts to Alabama being selected at No. 4. Wolverines and Crimson Tide in the CFP semi. pic.twitter.com/V2mrgLQA3W
— Adam Rittenberg (@ESPNRittenberg) December 3, 2023
Online, the video took off. Fans assumed Michigan’s reaction was out of shock and fear. However, one player now speaks out with an explanation.
“It’s funny that I keep hearing everybody say we’re scared because we got ‘Bama,” says Wolverines linebacker Michael Barrett. “It was more like the shock of not seeing an undefeated Power 5 team get picked. We kind of figured that all the undefeated teams were going to come & we were just debating on who would slip into that fourth spot. So not seeing Florida State in there, it was kind of a shock to everybody. It wasn’t really like fear, never that, of any team. It was just more that shock. We kind of just were already expecting, ‘okay, if they got (Texas) at 3, then they’ve got to be Florida State at 4.’ “
Barrett’s explanation makes sense, but many will choose to believe what they want, which is fair. The team was in shock not over who they would be playing and fear that they would lose, but that Florida State was left out of the top four after the season they had.
This explanation comes days before they meet the Crimson Tide in Pasadena for the College Football Playoff Rose Bowl semifinal, which goes to show how confident Michigan was then, and how the team feels now.
Roll Tide Wire will continue to follow Alabama football as the team continues to prepare in the final days leading up to the highly-anticipated matchup.
Contact/Follow us @RollTideWire on X, and like our page on Facebook to follow ongoing coverage of Alabama news, notes and opinion. You can also follow AJ Spurr on X @SpurrFM .

author: Kathryn Pinkston
title: Jackson health department hosts ‘Fight Flu Round 2’
text:
1 hour ago Kathryn Pinkston , JACKSON, Tenn. — The Jackson-Madison County Regional Health Department hosted its ‘Fight Flu Round 2’ event Thursday.
The event provided free flu vaccines to the public. It’s important to get vaccinated before flu season starts because it takes a couple weeks after vaccination for antibodies to develop in the body. Nationally, 7.5 million illnesses and 6,300 deaths could be prevented annually if more people chose to get a flu vaccine.
“Getting your flu shot now or soon, in the next week or so, is going to have you protected by the time thanksgiving rolls around and we really do want to get protected before the holidays come. It’s gonna help prevent the spread of flu at all those holiday gatherings,” said Ginger Rowsey, public information officer for JMCRH.
The flu vaccine is safe and effective and can prevent against the most common types of circulating flu viruses and the flu’s worst symptoms.
For more news in the Jackson area, click here .

author: Xavi Oller
title: 'De Viernes' cancel·la l'entrevista més esperada i anuncia la nova llista de convidats
text:
[NOTÍCIES](https://e-noticies.cat/tveo/noticies)
'De Viernes' cancel·la l'entrevista més esperada i anuncia la nova llista de convidats
Després de filtrar-se que comptaria amb la convidada del moment, 'De Viernes' ha anunciat una llista diferent.
'De Viernes' prepara un lliurament ple d'entrevistes i contingut exclusiu per a aquest 13 de desembre. En aquesta ocasió, [Bárbara Rey tornarà a ocupar un lloc central després de l'especial emès](https://e-noticies.cat/tveo/noticies/nacho-abad-paralitza-boca-todos-llancar-avis-directe-barbara-rey) dilluns passat. Tot i això, 'De Viernes' no comptarà amb l'esperada entrevista de Terelu Campos, que abordaria el naixement del seu nét.
Belén Esteban va avançar a 'Ni que fuéramos' que Terelu Campos havia signat per participar a ['De Viernes'.](https://www.telecinco.es/de-viernes/) Tot i això, l'entrevista hauria estat anul·lada per decisió de la seva filla, Alejandra Rubio, i Carlo Costanzia. La parella li hauria prohibit parlar del nadó.
["Terelu Campos no s'asseurà demà.](https://e-noticies.cat/tveo/noticies/gerro-aigua-freda-terelu-camps-exclusiva-pessebre-esteve-que-no-li-agrades)Han tirat l'entrevista enrere perquè la seva filla i Carlo Costanzia els han dit que ella no s'ha d'asseure per parlar ni d'ells ni del seu nét", va explicar Belén Esteban. A més, ha afegit: "La cadena, amb el contracte que ha signat, li ha dit que si no en parla, no parlarà de res".
Pel que fa als continguts confirmats, [Bárbara Rey serà protagonista amb revelacions inèdites](https://e-noticies.cat/tveo/noticies/contundent-reaccio-mercedes-mila-lentrevista-barbara-rey-viernes) de la seva vida personal i professional. Entre els temes que abordarà a la seva entrevista exclusiva destaquen l'oferta econòmica que va rebre d'un suposat representant del govern d'Hugo Chávez per material comprometedor sobre el rei emèrit. També dels detalls d'un estrany favor que el monarca li va demanar el 1978, i el seu idil·li amb Paquirri el 1979. A més, recordarà el moment en què es va cancel·lar a última hora la seva participació al programa Tómbola.
Jenny Llada també serà al plató per reaccionar en directe a les dures paraules que Bárbara Rey li dedica a l'entrevista. Aquest segment comptarà amb l'anàlisi de convidats com ara Hugo Arriazu, paparazzi; Danielle Sánchez, testimoni clau de la destrucció d'enregistraments del rei emèrit; Ángel Moreno, productor de Tòmbola; i el periodista Javier Chicote.
A més, serà entrevistada a 'De Viernes' Gabriela Guillén, mare de l'últim fill de Bertín Osborne. Parlarà de la seva dramàtica història personal, incloent-hi episodis d'abusos i intents de suïcidi, a més de la seva relació actual amb el cantant.
D'altra banda, [Maica Benedicto, expulsada de Gran Hermano, aprofitarà](https://e-noticies.cat/tveo/reality/gran-hermano-dona-sorpresa-doble-expulsio-que-trenca-estimada-parella) la seva visita per reflexionar sobre el seu pas pel reality i resoldre comptes pendents. Per completar el programa, Patricia Pérez i el seu marit Luis Canut compartiran la seva experiència després de superar l'any més complicat de les seves vides.
[➡️ Notícies](/tveo/noticies)
Més notícies:

author: @andaluciainf
title: Antonio Pulido: “Devolvemos a la sociedad parte de lo que recibimos” | Andalucía Información. Todas las noticias de Jaén
text: El presidente de la Fundación Cajasol, Antonio Pulido, se siente orgulloso de la labor que realiza su entidad en Andalucía, porque están consiguiendo “devolverle a la sociedad parte de lo que recibimos de ella”, un balance que ha realizado en el programa ‘Acento Andaluz’ de 7TV en el que ha analizado también la situación financiera y económica. Así, Pulido ha considerado sobre el futuro de Unicaja que el “tamaño es importante y que tiene que mejorar sus ratios” para operar en el sistema financiero actual, aunque sí que ha alabado la profesionalización de su equipo”, porque “no podemos estar con cuotas territoriales”. “Es una reflexión general”, insistía Pulido, que sí destacaba que “Unicaja ha hecho una cosa muy bien, que es la profesionalización de su equipo directivo. No podemos estar con cuotas territoriales”, apuntaba, explicando que si no se huye de los “conceptos de origen” y se aplican criterios estrictamente profesionales, “no funciona, ninguna empresa del mundo funciona”. Pulido también ha aplaudido la apuesta por la simplificación administrativa emprendida por el Gobierno andaluz e incluso ha invitado al resto de administraciones “sean del signo que sean a que encojan de alguna manera los trámites”, que obligan a una pyme a buscarse una gestoría cuando “hay que facilitar lo máximo posible”. Ha asegurado que la estabilidad política, como la que vive Andalucía en estos momentos, es un valor de crecimiento y un factor para la inversión, inversiones que ve algo ralentizadas en España por la situación política actual, aunque ha considerado que en general “va bien, no para un sobresaliente o notable, pero sí un bien”, ya que sólo algo de freno en las inversiones y el escaso ahorro de las familias como puntos negativos de la economía actual. Balance de la Fundación Cajasol “Estamos llegando, hay capilaridad y la gente se siente identificada”, decía Pulido satisfecho al hacer un balance general de la Fundación Cajasol, apuntando que están consiguiendo su objetivo, “devolverle a la sociedad parte de lo que recibimos de ella”, algo que están consiguiendo a través de la cultura, la acción social, el emprendimiento, la formación y deportes Destacó como referentes la programación de Semana Santa, que en el caso de la sede de Sevilla se traduce en tres exposiciones de Tramos de Cuaresma a la vez, y la de los Gozos de Diciembre, de especial tradición especialmente en las provincias en las que está más implantada, como es Sevilla, Huelva, Cádiz y Córdoba, que en su opinión forman parte del “ideario colectivo” de la sociedad. También destacó los programas solidarios como Andaluces Compartiendo o Cajasol Educa, con un enfoque que no sólo busca aportar alimentos sino también formación e integración, o la Escuela de Negocios del Instituto de Estudios Cajasol, con la que se busca que los que se formen “reporten el valor añadido a su tierra”, con un 60% de alumnos becados. Envía tu noticia a: [participa@andaluciainformacion.es](mailto:participa@andaluciainformacion.es)

author: Rafael Walendorff
title: Governo vai fomentar produção de arroz na agricultura familiar
text:
Arroz: governo e setor produtivo firmam acordo para monitorar preços e abastecimento Agricultura familiar conquista mais recurso e apoio para cultivo de arroz Preço do arroz em leilão anulado não seguiu parecer técnico Segundo a estatal, o programa vai prever um conjunto de ações de fomento para a produção de arroz por agricultores familiares. A medida contará com crédito com juros menores (de 3% ao ano para cultivo tradicional e 2% para plantio orgânico), fomento, acompanhamento técnico, garantia de comercialização e acesso à mecanização. Um dos objetivos é eliminar a colheita manual do segmento.
Veja Mais As medidas serão implementadas nas regiões Nordeste, Centro-Oeste, Norte e Sudeste do país. Atualmente, o Sul responde por 85% da produção nacional.
Serão contemplados os Estados do Maranhão, Alagoas, Paraíba, Piauí, Rio Grande do Norte, Pernambuco, Sergipe, Ceará, Bahia, Pará, Rondônia, Goiás, Mato Grosso e Minas Gerais. A ação é coordenada pela Conab em conjunto com o Ministério do Desenvolvimento Agrário, o Ministério do Desenvolvimento e Assistência Social, Família e Combate à Fome, o Consórcio Interestadual de Desenvolvimento Sustentável do Nordeste (Consórcio Nordeste), movimento sociais e sindicais e centrais de economias solidárias, disse a estatal em nota.
"A partir dessa iniciativa, cerca de 10 mil famílias produtoras deverão receber incentivo para aprimorar o cultivo de arroz , seja a partir de acompanhamento técnico, do apoio para aquisição de pacotes tecnológicos de baixo impacto (aquisição de maquinário, construção de silos armazenadores) de forma a zerar a colheita manual, até a comercialização", afirmou, no comunicado.
Entre as ferramentas já existentes e executadas pela Conab que poderão ser utilizadas como forma de apoiar o escoamento do produto estão o Programa de Aquisição de Alimentos (PAA) e o lançamento de Contratos de Opção de Venda.
A Conab afirmou que o governo pretende impulsionar a distribuição de sementes de arroz para essas famílias a partir do PAA.
Também será realizado um diagnóstico da produção de arroz , feijão e mandioca pela agricultura familiar . O objetivo é elaborar um sistema de informações da produção da agricultura familiar , povos indígenas, povos e comunidades tradicionais e direcionar de forma mais eficiente outras políticas públicas que fortaleça os territórios e melhore a vida de suas populações.
Mais recente Próxima Arroz: governo e setor produtivo firmam acordo para monitorar preços e abastecimento

author: , Detroit Free Press
title: Heavy rains cause flooding in metro Detroit freeways, neighborhoods
text:
Metro Detroit is under another flooding and now a flash flooding advisory Frank Witsil Detroit Free Press Show Caption
Hide Caption
How to drive safely in any kind of severe weather Meteorologist Tony Laubach offers tips on how to drive safely when tornadoes, high winds, hail or flooding threaten your drive. With more storms and rainfall Friday afternoon, the National Weather Service issued alerts for flooding — and flash flooding, which is even more serious — in metro Detroit.
The advisories, which came just after noon, and are set to last until 4 p.m., but could be extended depending on how much more rain falls, and they apply to communities in parts of Oakland, Macomb and Wayne counties.
A flash flood advisory, meaning that sudden flooding could occur with little warning, also was issued for Detroit and parts of Wayne and Macomb counties, including the suburbs of Hamtramck, Eastpointe and St. Clair Shores.
Forecasters said residents in low-lying areas, and areas where rain water already is ponding, should take extra precautions because the additional rainfall is adding to the 2-3 inches that was dropped overnight, causing localized flooding, especially on Interstate 696.
"It’s kind of hard to pinpoint exactly where the thundershowers might appear," weather service meteorologist Megan Varcie in White Lake Township told the Free Press earlier Friday, adding that the forecasters were "closely monitoring" the radar.
Earlier, a band of rain swept through the area, pummeling Oakland and Macomb counties.
As a result, I-696, near 11 Mile, was closed, along with the I-94 ramp at I-696, the eastbound I-696 ramp to I-94, the westbound I-96 ramp to M-39, and the westbound I-94 on ramp to 12 Mile, as police and transportation officials wait for standing water to subside.
In Oakland County, flooded areas including parts of Royal Oak and Bloomfield Hills, and in Macomb County, various neighborhoods, particularly in the cities of Warren and Roseville.
Feds: Leaders of large-scale drug network in Michigan, other states indicted
Varcie urged motorists to avoid flooded roadways, and offered a rhyme to help them remember: "Turn around, don't drown." She added that driving through water is a bad idea because "you never know how deep the water is" until your are in it, and by then, it is probably too late.
For now, Varcie said, rain appears to have stopped with not much appearing on radar until the early afternoon, when thunderstorms could “pop back up as the daytime heat starts to get going,” leading the weather service to issue another flood alert.
Highs, she said, are expected to be in the low 80s.
But by the weekend, the rain — and much of the pooled water that it left behind — is expected to have dissipated, with more appealing August days with mostly sunny skies, and high temperatures in the mid- to upper-80s.
Contact Frank Witsil: 313-222-5022 or fwitsil@freepress.com.

author: Mandy Miles
title: CHERYL CATES’ MEMORY LIVES IN WITH CHARITABLE FOUNDATION
text: The Cheryl Cates Memorial Foundation on Sept. 13 continued its mission of helping local families and children with a fundraiser at Key West Theater that raised more than $60,000. Former Key West first lady Cheryl Cates died from COVID in December 2020, as did one of her daughters, Crystal Cates. In the wake of her loss, the family created the Cheryl Cates Memorial Foundation to continue Cheryl’s commitment to bridging gaps in services and funding for the community’s most vulnerable residents. All the money raised at the recent event “will go straight to the Keys community, either via direct grants to struggling Keys residents or other non profits supporting struggling families,” said Cheryl Cates’s daughter Tammy Cates Berard. The Sept. 13 event also celebrated Cates’ love of local music by featuring live performances, including by Howard LIvingston, one of her personal friends and favorites. In addition to music, the event included a silent auction and live auction of artwork and other Key West-centric treasures.

author: Gareth Hampshire
title: Airbus awarded $25M contract for Nova Scotia's new water bombers | CBC News
text: [Nova Scotia](/news/canada/nova-scotia)·New Aging fleet being replaced by same model with new safety features Nova Scotia is getting its new wildfire fighting helicopters from aerospace company Airbus. The new water bombers will replace the fleet of four helicopters that helped fight devastating wildfires in Nova Scotia in 2023. Those helicopters have reached the point where they're needing increased maintenance , which led to the province's decision to purchase new aircraft. "It was coming to that maintenance schedule where it was going to cost a lot of money," said Tory Rushton, minister of natural resources and renewables. The contract is valued at about $25 million, although the province plans to sell its existing helicopters to bring down the overall cost. Nova Scotia and the federal government are investing $25.6 million over five years for training and equipment to fight wildfires, including helicopters. The province said the agreement is in its third year and fire trucks, pumps, hoses and other equipment have already been purchased. "We know the wildfire seasons are going to be longer and more severe fires, so this was a good agreement and a good relationship," Rushton said. The department is pleased with the performance of its current Airbus H125 helicopters, so it is replacing them with the same model with upgraded safety features. It said while fighting fires, the helicopters can scoop and dump water on a faster rotation than fixed-wing aircraft as well as being able to draw water from smaller water bodies. In addition to fighting fires, the helicopters are used in a number of other ways, including search and rescue efforts as well as aerial surveillance. It is expected the first new helicopter will arrive next summer.
